title: Sling Media Sling Adapter for ViP 722 or ViP 722k HD DuoDVR
description:
Connect and gain access to thousands of movies and TV shows and watch them instantly on your television. 
Choose from free titles, new releases and old favorites - there's something for everyone. 
Have an HDTV? Take advantage of our library of HD and stunning Blu-ray DiscTM quality 1080p HD titles. 
Visit Midnight Lounge for a premium selection of adult titles. 
Manage your DVR library from any compatible computer or mobile device. 
Use your iPhone or iPadTM as a remote control for your DISH receiver. 
Browse and search the program guide on the fly. 
Schedule new recordings and modify old ones.
